REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f5479 reute b f BC-/-FED-ADDS-RESERVES-V 03-17 0061

TEXT.TITLE: FED ADDS RESERVES VIA CUSTOMER REPURCHASES
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve entered the U.S. Government securities market to arrange two billion dlrs of customer repurchase agreements, a Fed spokesman said. Dealers said Federal funds were trading at 6-1/16 pct when the Fed began its temporary and indirect supply of reserves to the banking system. Reuter
